titleStmt.title: SII 8.223: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 223. (A.R. No. 624-A of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiruvalañcuḻiyāḻvār koyilil nampirāṭṭiyār Ulokamāteviyār vaitta kṣettrapāladevaṟkkum gaṇapatiyāṟkum devatānam Innamparnāṭṭut taḷiyacukūrc caṭṭakaḷ maṭappuṟattuk kaḷanilan variyiliṭṭapaṭi kalveṭṭiyatu . kovirājarāja
rājakesaripanmarāna śrīrājarājadevaṟk=ku yāṇṭu patiṉāṟāvatumutal Aḷan=tapaṭi paḻanilaṉ Uḷpaṭa nilan Eḻaraiyey munṟumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻaraiye muṉṟumā varaikkāṇiy muntirikaik kiḻ nālumāk kāṇi muntirikaiyilum Ūrirukkaiy nilan muṉṟumāvin kiḻ Āṟumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻ
eṭṭumā nikkiy Iraṇṭupū viḷaiyum nilan Eḻey Eḻumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻ Āṟumā mukkāṇiyk kiḻ mukkāley mākāṇiy mun=tirikaiyum pākaṟtoṭṭam nilan munṟumāvum Āka nilan Eḻaraiye mukkāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻ Āṟumā mukkāṇik kiḻ mukkāley mākāṇi muntirikaiyinālk kāṇikkaṭaṉ
nel Eḻunūṟṟu nāṟppattumuk kalane tūṇip patakku Aññāḻiyilum munnittevarkku Iṟuttuvarukiṉṟa nellu Irunūṟṟukkalamum paḻampaṭiye Iṟuppatāka nikki Iṟaikaṭṭina nellu Aiññūṟṟu nāṟppattumukkalaney tūṇip patakku Aiññāḻiyum śrīkovirājarāja rājakesarivarmmarāna śrīrājarājarājadevarkku
yāṇṭu Irupattunālāvatu nāḷ Irunūṟ ṟeṇpattañciṉāl toṇṭaimāṉāṟṟūr rukkaik kāvaṇattu Eḻun=taruḷi Irun=tu nam peṇṭukaḷil tanticattiviṭaṅkiyāna Ulokamātevi tiruvalañcuḻiyāḻvār koyilil vaitta kṣetrapālarkkumgaṇapatiyārkkum tevatānam rājentraciṅkavaḷanāṭṭu Innamparnāṭṭut taḷiyacukūr caṭṭa
kaḷ maṭappuṟattuk kaḷadevaṟkkum nel Irunūṟṟuk kala nikki Iṟaikaṭṭina nellu Aiññūṟṟu nāṟppattumuk kalaney tūṇip patakku Aiññāḻiyum Itdevarkaḷukku veṇṭum nivantaṅkaḷukku palapaṇinimantakkāṟarkkum yāṇṭu Irupattunālāvatu pacānamutal tevatāṉam Iṟaiyiliyāka variyi
liṭṭuk kuṭukka venṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉā renṟu tirumantiravolai rājakesarinallūr kiḻavankāṟāyil paṟppaṉāpan Eḻuttiṉālum tirumantiravolaināyakan mummaṭicoḻa bramamārāyanum mummaṭicoḻa pocaṉum maturāntaka muventaveḷāṉum Oppiṭṭuppukunta keḻvippa
ṭiyey variyiliṭṭukkoḷka veṉṟu Atikārikaḷ Āṟṟūruṭaiyārum kaḻumalamuṭaiyāru mālaṅkuṭaiyārum parakesari muveṉtaveḷārum parākkiramacoḻa muventaveḷārum minavan muveṉtaveḷārum cempiyan muventaveḷārum niṭurkiḻavarum tevankuṭaiyārum tirunallūruṭaiyārum naṭuvirukkum kaṭalaṅku
ṭit tāmotirapaṭṭarum koṭṭaiyūrp pūvattapaṭṭarum Eva puravuvarik kiḻavar kaṇavatiyum kāman paḻaiyavaeOḷāṉum cen=tan mallaṉum pittiramapūṣaṇan Irāmaṉum varippottakam ciṅkan veṇkāṭaṉum pakavati Aṅkiyum Irun=tu yāṇṭu Irupattañcāvatu nāḷ nālinṉāl variyil Iṭṭatu .
Digital edition of SII 8.223 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
